short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus On Programming: Code without distractions! Only programming-related sites allowed, except those from Google searches

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay on track with the Focus On Programming! This extension is tailored for programmers, ensuring that only coding-related websites remain within reach. Any site not related to programming gets directed into a  404-page page, but sites visited from a Google search are automatically allowed, letting you research without barriers!
